attributes.additional_details:
The legalisation of cannabis will save our economy.

Many people are prohibited from a beneficial medicine; doctors cannot prescribe cannabis.

Hemp is quite probably the most useful raw material on the planet.  Its uses are well documented; for example as fuel, fibre and paper amongst many other things.

Police time is wasted, the courts full, the prisons overcrowded; over 80% of drug convictions are for cannabis.

Annual deaths:

Tobacco 435,000
Alcohol 85,000
Cannabis 0
